name: Horror
mutagen_message: Another eye opens in your mind.
//: iv_message: You feel the stars overtaking you.

name: Milk Maid
mutagen_message: You feel an urge to moo.
//: iv_message: Where is your master? You need to be milked.

name: Maid
mutagen_message: You body began to burn hotly for a master-slave relationship.
//: iv_message: I can feel my body being remade. Surely now I can serve you better.
